title: Create Epic Comment

params.name: epic_public_id
params.desc: Required. The ID of the associated Epic.

params.name: author_id
params.desc: The Member ID of the Comment’s author. Defaults to the user identified by the API token.

params.name: created_at
params.desc: Defaults to the time/date the comment is created, but can be set to reflect another date.

params.name: external_id
params.desc: This field can be set to another unique ID. In the case that the comment has been imported from another tool, the ID in the other tool can be indicated here.

params.name: updated_at
params.desc: Defaults to the time/date the comment is last updated, but can be set to reflect another date.

description: This endpoint allows you to create a threaded Comment on an Epic.
